entries.meaning: The process of changing the color or something.
An object that has had its color changed.
examples: She elaborates further: "It has given me great satisfaction and fulfillment that people like my recolors. These feelings make my days less lonely and boring, even if it is only from a recolor of an object in a computer simulation game.  […]

verbs.description: recolor (third-person singular simple present recolors, present participle recoloring, simple past and past participle recolored)
